The Tagalog language headline translates: P50,000 bonus for all the members of SSS Already Signed by President Duterte. Watch How You Can Register Online".
The Philippines: Social Security System (SSS) posted a statement on September 7 stating that the claim is "fake news" and that President Duterte did not sign a law for a P50,000 bonus.
A reverse image search on Google led to: People's Television Network (PTV), which did not mention anything about a 50,000 peso bonus payment or how to sign up for it.
